Explanation: ^This dialogue is meant to test the dialogue system
^It contains a few small branching paths, longer lines like this one, and even a few tags to test the speaker system, among other things like variables and such.
SpeakerTest: ^I'm here to make sure that that speakers show up properly
^You should see a sprite this time!
^For a second the speaker did not speak, and you noticed because the nameplate was not displaying.
^Oh wait, I gotta test that the nameplate comes back on the correct side!
^And then I came back once again!
^This time I should be on the right side of the screen
^While I'm here, let me test a few other things for you
^First, make sure a warning was logged to Unity Console if you can see it
^Should say something along the lines of ("Invalid Tag" could not be read, please check its formatting/spelling it or have it removed. Refer to the docs for more information on proper tag writing)
^Ok, this is the end of the speaker test.
^for the final time, the speaker left
VariableTest: ^If the last line displayed "hello", then variables are displaying correctly
